content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS, with fuel inventory (2 coal) and furnace_result containing 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status: NO_POWER, electrical_id updated to 11904.
- ElectricityGroup with id=11904 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points [(5.0, 21.5), (0.0, 21.5)], warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”], status: NOT_CONNECTED, and neighbours including pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5), and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 200 units of water at 15°C, status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, connection points [(-5.5, 22.5), (-5.5, 26.5)], steam_output at (-7.5, 24.5), and updated fluid_system [44484].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 100 units of water at 15°C, status: WORKING, connection point (-9.5, 23.5), and updated fluid_system [44484].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44484 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44485 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44486 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44491 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44490 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44495 at position(3.5, 25.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44494 at position(2.5, 24.5) – EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44497 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Failures with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  • Repeated connection attempts using preset fluid_system values [43796, 43839, 43882, 43925, 43968, 44011, 44054, 44097, 44140, 44183, 44226, 44269, 44312, 44355, 44398, 44441] resulted in no working PipeGroup.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and verify the active PipeGroup’s fluid_system identifier using the current network configuration before attempting a connection.
- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Using preset fluid_system values without runtime validation leads to aborted pipeline connection attempts.
  • Tip: Validate the network’s fluid configuration dynamically prior to initiating a connection.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains unfueled, disrupting the steam cycle.
  • Tip: Replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory promptly to maintain continuous operation.
